alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Medina; Portage; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 17 at 7:27PM EST until February 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by ice jams and excessive runoff from rainfall and snowmelt remains possible. * WHERE...Portions of Ohio and northwest Pennsylvania, including the following counties. In Ohio: Ashland, Ashtabula Inland, Ashtabula Lakeshore, Crawford, Cuyahoga, Erie, Geauga, Hancock, Holmes, Huron, Knox, Lake, Lorain, Lucas, Mahoning, Marion, Medina, Morrow, Ottawa, Portage, Richland, Sandusky, Seneca, Stark, Summit, Trumbull, Wayne, Wood and Wyandot. In northwest Pennsylvania: Crawford, Northern Erie and Southern Erie. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff and/or ice jams may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and in other low-lying and flood-prone locations, including urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Medina; Portage; Summit
